images.description: SDSS image of region near spiral galaxy NGC 3930, also showing PGC 213893
SDSS image of spiral galaxy NGC 3930
HST image of part of spiral galaxy NGC 3930

A composite DSS image showing spiral galaxy NGC 3930 and the rapid proper-motion star Groombridge 1830. The red and blue DSS images were taken on different dates, so the star is shown as apparently two separate stars, one from the red plate and the other from the blue plate.
SDSS image of region near spiral galaxy PGC 213893, which is sometimes called NGC 3930A, also showing NGC 3930
SDSS image of spiral galaxy PGC 213893, which is sometimes called NGC 3930A
